Let Us Introduce Our Selves!

Living in the 21st century, it has become a necessity to have a website for your business, whether it be big or small. Without a website, you are potentially losing a great number of opportunities for your business. A website for your business helps to accomplish a number of different marketing strategies that allows for rapid growth of your business. Taking a concept as simple as 'reach', the web has a far wider reach than any other form of advertising. This has been proven time and time again by various different marketing strategists. A businesses website is the center of your online presence... Through this website, you advertise your business worldwide through various different social networking sites, forums and through pay per click advertising programs.


Here at SimplX we have a highly experienced and performance driven team. We have had experience in creating websites, custom web app solutions as well as mobile development for various different customers. Allow our team to handle the essential digital footprint every business needs.

Benefits of a Website or Custom Web Application:

A personal or business website is one of the most critical first impressions portrayed to any potential customer or stakeholder looking into any business. A website for your business can be referred to as your business address as this is where any individual can find your business as well as gain further information about your products or services. At SimplX, we have had personal experience in observing businesses grow due to outstanding websites produced by our team. In today's times almost 90% of businesses are located and found by simple search engine results. Without a website or any online digital presence, your business will not be found or even considered.

Another relevant topic that one has to consider with regards to the retail of goods is that almost everything that is available in the shops is now available online. At SimplX, our team is capable of creating advanced online stores to suit your business needs. If you are currently selling items but do not have an e-commerce store, you are already at a major disadvantages to your competitors. In order to boost advertising and increase sales, it is imperative that your products and services are available online. Allow our team at SimplX to guide you and develop the perfect online solution for you.

Advantages of a personal or business website:

  • 93% of businesses purchasing decisions start with search engine results
  • Without a website, there is a portion of the market that will not even know about your business
  • Having a website makes it far easier for customers to find you
  • A website is a low cost marketing tool
  • Indefinite return on investment
  • A website has long lasting value

Advantages of an E-Commerce Store:

  • Fast Go-to Market time
  • Shopping starts online
  • Reduced costs
  • Fast data collection
  • Reach different and new customers
  • Niche market entry
  • You are able to meet customers in the most convenient place for both parties to shop and sell goods
